ygData.subject: Re: group strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: Im level 11, and Im having trouble finding a spot for me and another 11 to fight whites or yells without being mobbed. Any help or ideas? -Dyce

Im level 11, and Im having trouble finding a spot for me and another 11 to
fight whites or yells without being mobbed.
Any help or ideas?
